data.title: Dorothy Dandridge & Nicholas Brothers
data.meta_description: The talented and beautiful Dorothy Dandridge danced with the Nicholas Brothers.
data.text:
The annual Los Angeles Tap Festival will host it’s 15th year July 31- Aug. 5th. Tap workshops will be held 7/31-8/4 at the Debbie Allen Dance Academy, 3791 Santa Rosalia Drive. Concert and Showcase will be 8/5 at L.A.C.E.S. school beginning at 7 pm. Check out this link for more about these exciting, upcoming, not to miss Tap Fest events https://www.TheLATapFest.com

Cathie Nicholas is the granddaughter of Nicholas Brother Dr. Fayard Nicholas, the legendary Tap Master, Teacher, Dancer, Choreographer and originator of flash-classical Tap! She teaches Tap in Los Angeles at DADA (Debbie Allen Dance Academy) and is Co-Director of the LATap Fest. A Dancer, choreographer in her own right, she can be found at Cathie Nicholas.

The Nicholas Brothers are the greatest Tap Dancers who ever lived. Fayard Nicholas and his younger brother Harold, appeared in more than 50 movies and TV shows. Harold, (first married to Dorothy Dandridge) and Fayard (first married to Geraldine “Geri” Pate) never had a dance lesson. Fayard choreographed and taught all their routines. Check them out at http://www.nicholasbrothers.com.
